text: Carmen de Patagones Airport is an airport serving the city of Carmen de Patagones in the Buenos Aires Province of Argentina. The airport is on the northern edge of Carmen de Patagones. The Viedma VOR (Ident: VIE) is located south of the airport. The Viedma non-directional beacon (Ident: VIE) is located south-southwest of Carmen de Patagones Airport. ==See also== * * *Transport in Argentina *List of airports in Argentina ==References== ==External links== *OpenStreetMap - Carmen de Patagones *OurAirports - Carmen de Patagones Airport * Category:Airports in Buenos Aires Province
title: Carmen de Patagones Airport
